articles.description: Vanessa Bryant, wife of the late Kobe Bryant, is urging Congress to pass a helicopter safety bill newly renamed for her husband and daughter who were killed in a crash earlier this year.
articles.content:
(CNN)Vanessa Bryant, wife of the late Kobe Bryant, is urging Congress to pass a new helicopter safety bill named for her husband and daughter who were killed in a crash earlier this year.
